title: Eight Remarks on Style and Fashion

history.message:
Hi Zane,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Zane,

Yes, yes, yes. Now you got it.

Yours,

D.

Dear Zane Perdue,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review

D.,

I appreciate it very much. I‘m glad to get something through-I really dig your publication.

-Zane
No email response sent to submitter.
